description: An interesting blog post where the square dev team suggests an alternative to Fragments. They use an URL style router "Flow" to structure your app into different screens. "Mortar" is leveraged to build all the precious object when you trigger a route. Each section of a Mortar app (each screen if you’re also using Flow) is defined by a Blueprint with its very own module. This module is most commonly provided as a singleton Presenter, a view controller with a simple lifecycle and its own persistence bundle. Check out the libraries in the libraries and code section.
title: Simpler Android apps with Flow and Mortar
